TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/Button/CheckBox extends System.Object
public: ref class VisualStyleElement::Button::CheckBox abstract sealed

summary.span: 为复选框控件的不同状态提供 对象。

span.span: Provides objects for the different states of the check box control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个属性类返回不同状态的复选框控件。Each property of the class returns a for a different state of the check box control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建与返回属性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a with the returned by the property. 若要运行此示例，请将其粘贴到 Windows 窗体中。To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. 处理窗体的事件并调用`DrawVisualStyleElement_Button_CheckBox1`方法从事件处理方法，并传递`e`作为。Handle the form’s event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElement_Button_CheckBox1` method from the event-handling method, passing `e` as . [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/CS/Form1.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb#14)]
